Package Persistance.Database

Interface GameDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
SQLGameDao
public interface GameDao
Used to communicate to the database and JSONDAO

  • Method Details

    • registerConnection

      void registerConnection(ConfigObject config)
      to connect the DAO to a database
      Parameters:
      config - the config object of containing the information for the database

    • getGamesPlayed

      int getGamesPlayed(String username) throws SQLException
      a function to get the number of games played by a certain user
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player we want to search for
      Returns:
      the number of games played by the searched user
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database

    • getGamesWon

      int getGamesWon(String username) throws SQLException
      a function to get the number of games won by a certain user
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player we want to search for
      Returns:
      the number of games won by the searched user
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database

    • getAttacksPerGame

      LinkedHashMap<Integer,Integer> getAttacksPerGame(String username) throws SQLException
      a function to get the number of attacks per game, and the number of games with that number of attacks for a given user
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player we want to search for
      Returns:
      the number of attacks, and how many games with that number of attacks
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database

    • saveGame

      void saveGame(int game_id, String username, int no_opponents, int attacks_made, Time duration, boolean won, int ships_remaining, boolean game_over) throws SQLException
      saving a game to the database
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player who played the game
      no_opponents - the number of opponents in the game
      attacks_made - the number of attacks made during the game
      duration - the duration of the game
      game_id - the id of the game
      game_over - to indicate if game has completed
      won - true if the user won the game, false otherwise
      ships_remaining - the users number of ships remaining at the end of the game
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database

    • saveGame

      void saveGame(int game_id, String username, int no_opponents, int attacks_made, Time duration, boolean won, int ships_remaining, boolean game_over, String game_path) throws SQLException
      saving a game to the database
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player who played the game
      no_opponents - the number of opponents in the game
      attacks_made - the number of attacks made during the game
      duration - the duration of the game
      game_path - the location of the game
      game_over - if the game is over
      game_id - id of the game
      won - true if the user won the game, false otherwise
      ships_remaining - the users number of ships remaining at the end of the game
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database

    • getNextGameId

      int getNextGameId() throws SQLException
      gets the next available game id
      Returns:
      an available game id
      Throws:
      SQLException - for errors with database
